'''Regina Probationum''' is [[Rosaria]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Trivia==
*The name comes from the Latin phrase "confessio est regina probationum" (lit. confession is the queen of trials), which was used to justify forced confessions via torture in Medieval Europe.
